0:
auth:
  - user: scans
    group: scans
    uid: 568
    gid: 568
    password: scans
global:
  - "force user = scans"
  - "force group = scans"
  - "create mask = 0644"
  - "directory mask = 0755"
share:
  - name: Scans
    path: /share1
    browsable: yes
    readonly: no
    guestok: no
    comment: "Printer scans"
    veto: yes

---
modules:
  default:
    metrics:
    - name: mcc
      path: "{ .Aggregated_PerSecondStats.Samples }"
      help: Per-second stats aggregated over a minute
      labels:
        environment: test

routers:
- name: Oracle Cloud, Aus East
  network:
    name: oracle-aue
    display_name: oracle-aue
  nos: linux
  address: localhost
  port: 2222
  credential:
    username: ubuntu
    password: ubuntu
  vrfs:
  - name: global
    default: true
    ipv4:
      source_address: 192.0.2.1
    ipv6:
      source_address: 2001:db8::1

[core]
cache_dir = /app/cache
config_dir = /config
data_dir = /app

[logging]
verbosity = 4
format = %(levelname)-8s %(asctime)s [%(process)d:%(threadName)s] %(name)s\n  %(message)s
color = true
config_file =

[audio]
mixer = software
output = audioresample ! audioconvert ! audio/x-raw,rate=48000,channels=2,format=S16LE ! wavenc ! tcpclientsink host=${SVC_SNAPSERVER_ADDR} port=4955
mixer_volume = 45

[file]
enabled = true
media_dirs = /media
show_dotfiles = false
excluded_file_extensions =
.cda
.directory
.html
.jpeg
.jpg
.lnk
.log
.m3u8
.nfo
.nmx
.pdf
.png
.txt
.url
.zip
follow_symlinks = true
metadata_timeout = 1000

[local]
library = sqlite
scan_flush_threshold = 100
media_dir = /media
scan_timeout = 4000
excluded_file_extensions =
.bmp
.cue
.png
.jpg
.jpeg
.doc
.docx
.nfo
.txt
.m3u
.sfv
.zip

[mpd]
hostname = 0.0.0.0
zeroconf = $hostname

[http]
enabled = true
hostname = 0.0.0.0
port = 6680
default_app = iris
zeroconf = $hostname
csrf_protection = false

[tidal]
enabled = false

- name: TZ
  value: "${TIMEZONE}"
- name: JAVA_OPTS_APPEND
  value: "-Djgroups.dns.query=keycloak-headless"
- name: KC_PROXY
  value: edge
- name: KC_HTTP_ENABLED
  value: "true"
- name: KC_HOSTNAME
  value: id.${DOMAIN_1}
- name: KC_HOSTNAME_STRICT
  value: "true"
- name: KC_HOSTNAME_STRICT_HTTPS
  value: "true"
- name: KC_LOG_LEVEL
  value: "org.keycloak.events:DEBUG,org.infinispan:INFO,org.jgroups:INFO"
- name: KEYCLOAK_ADMIN
  value: "${KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_USER}"
- name: KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASSWORD
  value: "${KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASS}"

# - name: QUARKUS_TRANSACTION_MANAGER_ENABLE_RECOVERY
#   value: "true"
# - name: KC_CACHE_STACK
#   value: kubernetes
# - name: KC_DB_USERNAME
#   value: "${POSTGRES_SSO_USERNAME}"
# - name: KC_DB_PASSWORD
#   value: "${POSTGRES_SSO_PASSWORD}"
# - name: KC_DB
#   value: postgres
# - name: KC_DB_URL_HOST
#   value: "postgresql.sso.svc.cluster.local"
# - name: KC_DB_URL_PORT
#   value: "5432"
# - name: KC_DB_URL_DATABASE
#   value: sso
# - name: KC_CACHE
#   value: ispn
# - name: KC_HTTP_RELATIVE_PATH
#   value: /auth
# - name: KC_HTTPS_CERTIFICATE_FILE
#   value: /opt/keycloak/conf/tls.crt
# - name: KC_HTTPS_CERTIFICATE_KEY_FILE
#   value: /opt/keycloak/conf/tls.key
# - name: KC_HTTPS_TRUST_STORE_FILE
#   value: /opt/keycloak/conf/truststore.jks
# - name: KC_HTTPS_TRUST_STORE_PASSWORD
#   value: password
# - name: KC_HTTPS_CLIENT_AUTH
#   value: request

# Could use the above envar, but lets use the quarkus conf file
quarkus.transaction-manager.enable-recovery=true
# quarkus.http.non-application-root-path=/

- name: objectstore
  emptyDir:
    sizeLimit: 100Mi
- name: quarkusproperties
  secret:
    secretName: keycloak-quarkusproperties
    defaultMode: 0777

- mountPath: /ObjectStore
  name: objectstore
- name: quarkusproperties
  mountPath: /opt/keycloak/conf/quarkus.properties
  subPath: quarkus.properties
